attributes.action: We call on NI assembly to hold a full scale Independent public inquiry into RHI
attributes.background: We the public call on the NI assembly and First Minister Arlene Foster & Deputy First Minister Martin McGuinness to hold a full scale Independent Public inquiry, led by an International Jurist, into (RHI) Renewable Heat Incentive scheme.

rejection.details:
This petition calls on the Northern Ireland Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
